languages.text: {n}Соломон тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "Я видел мертвых изменников с Тассеры. Тех, кто злоумышлял против нас. Они вошли в покои, под чужими личинами, но я все равно понял, что это они. Я понял, что перед смертью они успели вновь улизнуть в чужие тела. Это... Это... Дерьмо!" {n}Сквозь сжатые зубы вырывается полный боли стон.{/n}

{n}Solomorne sighs heavily.{/n} "I dreamt I saw the dead traitors from Thassera. The ones who plotted against us. They entered your chambers wearing others' faces, but I still knew it was them. I realised they had managed to slip back into other people's bodies before they died. It's... It's... Shit!" {n}A groan of pain escapes through his gritted teeth.{/n}

Дерьмо!" {n}Сквозь сжатые зубы вырывается полный боли стон.{/n}

{n}Solomorne sighs heavily.{/n} "I dreamed I saw the dead traitors from Thassera. The ones who plotted against us. They entered your chambers wearing others' faces, but I still knew it was them. I realised they had managed to slip back into other people's bodies before they died. It's... It's... Shit!" {n}A groan of pain escapes through his gritted teeth.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne pousse un long soupir.{/n} « J'ai vu les traîtres que nous avons tués sur Thassera, ceux qui avaient comploté contre nous. Ils portaient des visages différents quand ils sont entrés dans votre chambre, mais je les ai tout de suite reconnus. J'ai compris qu'ils avaient réussi à se glisser dans le corps d'autres personnes avant de mourir. C'est... C'est... Merde ! » {n}Un grognement de douleur s'échappe à travers ses dents serrées.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne sighs heavily.{/n} "I dreamt I saw the dead traitors from Thassera. The ones who plotted against us. They entered your chambers wearing others' faces, but I still knew it was them. I realised they had managed to slip back into other people's bodies before they died. It's... It's... Shit!" {n}A groan of pain escapes through his gritted teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne pousse un long soupir.{/n} « J'ai vu les traîtres que nous avons tués sur Thassera, ceux qui avaient comploté contre nous. Ils portaient des visages différents quand ils sont entrés dans votre chambre, mais je les ai tout de suite reconnus. J'ai compris qu'ils avaient réussi à se glisser dans le corps d'autres personnes avant de mourir. C'est... C'est... Merde ! » {n}Un grognement de douleur s'échappe à travers ses dents serrées.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは重いため息をついた。{/n}「タッセーラで死んだ裏切り者たちの夢を見ました。あの、反逆を企てた連中です。奴らは他人の顔をかぶってあなたの部屋に入ってきました…ですが、それでも私には奴らだと分かったんです。奴らは死ぬ前に、他人の体に入り込むことに成功していたのだと気づきました。それは…それは…クソッ！」{n}歯を食いしばった口から、苦悶のうめき声が漏れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne sighs heavily.{/n} "I dreamt I saw the dead traitors from Thassera. The ones who plotted against us. They entered your chambers wearing others' faces, but I still knew it was them. I realised they had managed to slip back into other people's bodies before they died. It's... It's... Shit!" {n}A groan of pain escapes through his gritted teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは重いため息をついた。{/n}「タッセーラで死んだ裏切り者たちの夢を見ました。あの、反逆を企てた連中です。奴らは他人の顔をかぶってあなたの部屋に入ってきました…ですが、それでも私には奴らだと分かったんです。奴らは死ぬ前に、他人の体に入り込むことに成功していたのだと気づきました。それは…それは…クソッ！」{n}歯を食いしばった口から、苦悶のうめき声が漏れた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne suspira profundamente.{/n} «He soñado que veía a los traidores muertos de Thassera. Los que conspiraron contra nosotros. Entraban en sus aposentos con otras caras, pero aun así reconocía que eran ellos. Me he dado cuenta de que habían escapado a otros cuerpos antes de morir. Es... Es... ¡Mierda!». {n}Un gemido de dolor escapa de sus labios.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne sighs heavily.{/n} "I dreamt I saw the dead traitors from Thassera. The ones who plotted against us. They entered your chambers wearing others' faces, but I still knew it was them. I realised they had managed to slip back into other people's bodies before they died. It's... It's... Shit!" {n}A groan of pain escapes through his gritted teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne suspira profundamente.{/n} «He soñado que veía a los traidores muertos de Thassera. Los que conspiraron contra nosotros. Entraban en sus aposentos con otras caras, pero aun así reconocía que eran ellos. Me he dado cuenta de que habían escapado a otros cuerpos antes de morir. Es... Es... ¡Mierda!». {n}Un gemido de dolor escapa de sus labios.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙沉重地叹了口气。{/n}“我梦到了塔瑟拉那些死了的叛徒，那些打算谋害我们的人。他们顶着其他人的脸走进了房间，但我知道那就是他们。我意识到，他们在临死之前，成功地与其他人交换了身体。这真是……这真是……该死！”{n}他咬紧牙关，发出一声痛苦的呻吟。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne sighs heavily.{/n} "I dreamt I saw the dead traitors from Thassera. The ones who plotted against us. They entered your chambers wearing others' faces, but I still knew it was them. I realised they had managed to slip back into other people's bodies before they died. It's... It's... Shit!" {n}A groan of pain escapes through his gritted teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙沉重地叹了口气。{/n}“我梦到了塔瑟拉那些死了的叛徒，那些打算谋害我们的人。他们顶着其他人的脸走进了房间，但我知道那就是他们。我意识到，他们在临死之前，成功地与其他人交换了身体。这真是……这真是……该死！”{n}他咬紧牙关，发出一声痛苦的呻吟。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, derince bir iç çekiyor.{/n} "Bize komplo kuran Thasseralı ölü hainleri gördüm. Başkalarının yüzlerini giymiş, odana giriyorlardı ama onlar olduğunu bir şekilde biliyordum. Ölmeden önce başkalarının vücutlarına girdiklerini fark ediyordum. Sonra... Of!" {n}Dişlerinin arasından acıyla inliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne sighs heavily.{/n} "I dreamt I saw the dead traitors from Thassera. The ones who plotted against us. They entered your chambers wearing others' faces, but I still knew it was them. I realised they had managed to slip back into other people's bodies before they died. It's... It's... Shit!" {n}A groan of pain escapes through his gritted teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne derince bir iç çekiyor.{/n} "Bize komplo kuran Thasseralı ölü hainleri gördüm rüyamda. Başkalarının yüzlerini giymiş, senin odana giriyorlardı ama onlar olduğunu bir şekilde biliyordum. Ölmeden önce başkalarının vücutlarına girdiklerini fark ediyordum. Sonra... Of! {n}Dişlerinin arasından acıyla inliyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne seufzt schwer.{/n} "Ich habe geträumt, die toten Verräter von Thassera zu sehen. Die, die sich gegen uns verschworen hatten. Sie kamen mit Masken in Eure Gemächer, aber ich wusste trotzdem, dass sie es sind. Mir wurde klar, dass sie vor ihrem Tod in die Körper anderer Leute geschlüpft waren. Das ... Das ... Scheiße!" {n}Ein Schmerzenslauf entfährt seinen zusammengepressten Zähnen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne sighs heavily.{/n} "I dreamt I saw the dead traitors from Thassera. The ones who plotted against us. They entered your chambers wearing others' faces, but I still knew it was them. I realised they had managed to slip back into other people's bodies before they died. It's... It's... Shit!" {n}A groan of pain escapes through his gritted teeth.{/n}
